== Periodic Waves ==

*Wavelength*

{{$
\frac{\lambda}{T} = v
}}$

*Speed of wave on a string*

{{$
v = \sqrt{\frac{F}{M/L}}
}}$
Where $F$ is the tension and $M/L$ is mass per length.

== Standing Waves ==

That cool thing string instruments do.

{{$

}}$
